name: Jemella: Jewel Match
description:
HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and Match 3 or more bubbles of the same colour
• Match as many bubbles as you can to release the jewel
• Helpful magical boosters are available throughout the games
• Achieve 3 stars to get more coins!
• Achieve the perfect high score with boosters!

FEATURES
• 3 MATCH PUZZLE
- An addictive matching puzzle game great characters and levels!

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Games is filled with unique and fun, amazing challenges!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy game to play and understand with a great interface, Just combine.

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play at your own pace.
- Play in anytime and anywhere!

• NO INTERNET CONNECTIONS NEEDED TO PLAY!
- Game can be played offline.

NOTES
• Jemella Jewel Match contains interstitial and video ads.
• Jemella Jewel Match is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items such as Coins

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game with various devices such as phones and tablets

E-MAIL
• info@sympogames.com

HOMEPAGE
